group_1.narration: At this moment, I possess power.
The power I gained by forming a contract@as a Magical Girl.

group_1.textCenter: (I first sensed it right after my contract, during@that fight with the Familiar...)
(But now that I've tested it again,@I fully understand.)
(No, "improved" doesn't even begin to describe it.)
(I should test how durable my body is, too―@just to be sure.)
I still need to determine everything that changes@when I transform... That's the key.

group_1.narration: My body has already surpassed the bounds of normality.
If I were to adopt the method of murder,@my revenge might be brought to an end swiftly.

group_1.textLeft: It's certainly true that until now,@I had no power of my own.
I can't explain in detail, but I do possess power.
Power capable of erasing you all from this@world with ease.
But I have no interest in such a@short-sighted conclusion.
I want to fully grasp the events that have@shaped my life.
I called you here to hear what you have to say.
Sasao... You served the Tokiwa family with@great devotion.
So why did you betray that devotion?

group_1.textRight: I don't know whether you've gained the support of@some organization, or what else may be at play...
I don't know what lies behind you now...@But your confidence is unmistakable.
I've known you since you were a child.
You've always been intelligent, calm, and@remarkably perceptive.
So when you say you're capable of revenge...@I believe you.
Very well...@I will tell you everything.
Why I betrayed the head family, the Tokiwa family...

group_1.narration: What I gained was more than@simply enhanced physical ability.
...It was the power to "discern my true enemies"...
That, above all, was the greatest reward@of my Magical Girl contract.
And that power is telling me―
The true enemy lies hidden...@even further behind you, Sasao.
